text: Yvrac is a commune in the region Nouvelle-Aquitaine in the Gironde department in southwest France. In 2012 a large 18th century chateau near the commune was destroyed by mistake. Builders were supposed to remove another small building and then begin work on restoring the chateau. The owner, a Russian businessman, said he will have the house rebuilt. ==References== Category:Communes in Gironde
title: Yvrac
